languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители докладывают, что ваша ручная эльдарка в скверном расположении духа и прямо сейчас направляется к капитанскому мостику. Задерживать ее не посмели, но, полагаю, впереди вас ждет непростой разговор".

"My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители докладывают, что ваша ручная эльдарка в скверном расположении духа и прямо сейчас направляется к капитанскому мостику. Задерживать ее не посмели, но, полагаю, впереди вас ждет непростой разговор".

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving towards the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

"My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

languages.text: “很抱歉打扰您，舰长大人。执法者报告称您的艾达灵族宠物心情不佳，正在朝舰桥移动。我们不敢阻止她，但我们估计她来找您没什么好事。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉打扰您，舰长大人。执法者报告称您的艾达灵族宠物心情不佳，正在朝舰桥移动。我们不敢阻止她，但我们估计她来找您没什么好事。”

languages.text: «Disculpe, Lord Capitán. Los guardias informan de que su mascota Aeldari se dirige al puente de mando con un humor de perros. No nos hemos atrevido a detenerla, pero me parece que le espera una conversación difícil».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe, Lord Capitán. Los guardias informan de que su mascota Aeldari se dirige al puente de mando con un humor de perros. No nos hemos atrevido a detenerla, pero me parece que le espera una conversación difícil».

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les rapports des prévôts indiquent que votre Aeldari est de très mauvaise humeur et qu'elle se dirige vers la passerelle de commandement. Nous n'avons pas osé tenter de l'intercepter, mais je pense qu'une discussion difficile vous attend. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les rapports des prévôts indiquent que votre Aeldari est de très mauvaise humeur et qu'elle se dirige vers la passerelle de commandement. Nous n'avons pas osé tenter de l'intercepter, mais je pense qu'une discussion difficile vous attend. »

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Die Enforcers melden, dass Euer Aeldari-Schoßhündchen schlechte Laune hat und zur Brücke unterwegs ist. Wir haben es nicht gewagt, sie aufzuhalten, aber ich schätze, vor Euch liegt ein schwieriges Gespräch."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Die Enforcers melden, dass Euer Aeldari-Schoßhündchen schlechte Laune hat und zur Brücke unterwegs ist. Wir haben es nicht gewagt, sie aufzuhalten, aber ich schätze, vor Euch liegt ein schwieriges Gespräch."

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサーの報告によると、陛下の愛玩動物のアエルダリが不機嫌な様子でキャプテンブリッジに向かっているとのことです。彼女を止めることはできませんでした…何やら雲行きが怪しくなりそうです」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサーの報告によると、陛下の愛玩動物のアエルダリが不機嫌な様子でキャプテンブリッジに向かっているとのことです。彼女を止めることはできませんでした…何やら雲行きが怪しくなりそうです」

languages.text: "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. İnfazcılar, evcil Aeldarinizin bugün çok aksi olduğunu ve kaptan köprüsüne doğru gittiğini belirtti. Onu durdurmaya cüret etmedik ama sizi zor bir görüşmenin beklediğini düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain. The enforcers report that your pet Aeldari is in a foul mood and is moving toward the captain's bridge. We didn't dare to stop her, but I expect that you have a difficult conversation ahead of you."

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. İnfazcılar, evcil Aeldari'nizin bugün çok aksi olduğunu ve kaptan köprüsüne doğru ilerlediğini belirttiler. Onu durdurmaya cüret etmedik ama sizi zor bir görüşmenin beklediğini düşünüyorum."
